metadata.description: Offensive concepts that beat specific defensive coverages

four_verticals.name: Four Verticals
four_verticals.description: All 4 eligible receivers run vertical routes, reading coverage

why_it_works.cover_3: 4 vertical threats vs 3 deep defenders - seams are open
why_it_works.cover_1: Tests man coverage, safety can't help everyone
why_it_works.cover_2: Attacks deep middle hole between safeties

four_verticals.key_read: Read safety - throw opposite his movement
four_verticals.hot_adjustment: Inside receivers can sit vs blitz

smash.name: Smash Concept
smash.description: High-low read on corner - hitch underneath, corner over top

why_it_works.cover_2: Corner route splits corner and safety
why_it_works.cover_4: Corner can't cover both hitch and corner route
why_it_works.tampa_2: Same as Cover 2 - corners are vulnerable

smash.key_read: Read the corner - if he squats on hitch, throw corner
smash.hot_adjustment: Hitch becomes hot route vs pressure

curl_flat.name: Curl-Flat

why_it_works.cover_3: Flat defender can't cover curl and flat - pick your poison
why_it_works.cover_3_sky: SS in flat can be out-leveraged
why_it_works.cover_3_cloud: Corner in flat creates window for curl

curl_flat.key_read: Read flat defender - throw opposite his drop

levels.name: Levels Concept
levels.description: Two crossing routes at different depths

why_it_works.cover_1: Crossers create natural picks in man coverage
why_it_works.cover_2_man: Hard to stay in phase through traffic
why_it_works.cover_0: Quick throw beats pressure, picks help

levels.key_read: Throw to receiver who comes open first

mesh.name: Mesh Concept
mesh.description: Two receivers cross underneath, creating picks

why_it_works.cover_1: Natural pick as receivers cross - illegal contact

mesh.key_read: Throw to first crosser who pops open

drive.name: Drive Concept

why_it_works.cover_3: Sits in zone holes at three levels
why_it_works.zone_blitz: Finds soft spots in fire zone

drive.key_read: Read high to low - dig, shallow, check down

dagger.name: Dagger Concept
dagger.description: Post clears out safety, dig sits underneath

why_it_works.cover_1: Post holds safety, dig is wide open
why_it_works.cover_3: Post occupies FS, dig finds hole

dagger.key_read: Post is primary if 1-on-1, dig if safety helps

double_post.name: Double Post (Mills)
double_post.description: Two post routes bracketing the safety

why_it_works.cover_1: Safety can only help one side
why_it_works.cover_3: FS has to choose - either post is open
why_it_works.cover_2_trap: Trapping safety leaves other post open

double_post.hot_adjustment: Hot to RB or quick out

flood.name: Flood Concept
flood.description: Three receivers flood one side at three levels

why_it_works.cover_3: 3 routes vs 2 defenders to that side
why_it_works.cover_2: Corner route beats corner, flat beats LB

flood.key_read: High-low read on flat defender, then corner

scissors.name: Scissors Concept
scissors.description: Post and corner cross, creating natural pick
scissors.key_read: Throw to receiver who gets free at cross

yankee.name: Yankee/Sail

why_it_works.cover_2: Corner route in hole, go clears safety
why_it_works.cover_4: Too many routes for pattern match

yankee.key_read: Corner route usually open, check go if 1-on-1

china.name: China Concept

why_it_works.cover_3: Deep cross finds hole behind LBs

china.key_read: Deep cross primary, drag check down

slant_flat.name: Slant-Flat
slant_flat.description: Quick game high-low on flat defender

post_wheel.name: Post-Wheel
post_wheel.description: RB wheel with post clearing safety
post_wheel.key_read: Post if safety stays, wheel if safety jumps

spacing.name: Spacing Concept
spacing.key_read: Find open grass, throw to most open

stick.name: Stick Concept
stick.description: Quick game with vertical clear out

why_it_works.zone_blitz: Beats fire zone with quick hit

out_n_up.name: Out-and-Up (Sluggo)
out_n_up.description: Double move to beat aggressive coverage

why_it_works.cover_1: Aggressive man coverage bites on first move
why_it_works.cover_0: High reward vs no safety help

out_n_up.key_read: Must have time - needs max protect

snag.name: Snag Concept
snag.description: Triangle read with spot route as primary

inside_zone.name: Inside Zone
inside_zone.description: O-line blocks zone, RB reads backside A-gap
inside_zone.key_read: RB reads backside LB - cut or stay

outside_zone.name: Outside Zone (Stretch)
outside_zone.description: Stretch play forcing defense to run sideline to sideline

why_it_works.cover_3: SS in coverage can't support quickly

outside_zone.key_read: RB reads DE - cut up or bounce

power.name: Power
power.description: Gap scheme with guard pulling to kick out

counter.name: Counter
counter.blocking: Down blocks, guard and tackle pull

why_it_works.zone_blitz: Blitzers run themselves out of play

counter.key_read: Follow pullers, cut off tackle block

trap.name: Trap
trap.blocking: Guard pulls inside to kick DT

toss.name: Toss/Pitch
toss.description: Outside run with pitch to RB

why_it_works.cover_0: All defenders in box but no edge

why_it_works.cover_1: Safety can't get there in time

iso.name: Iso (Isolation)
iso.description: Fullback leads through hole to block LB

why_it_works.4-3: FB gets clean shot on MLB

duo.name: Duo
duo.description: Power zone scheme with double teams

screen_rb.name: RB Screen
screen_rb.description: Fake pass, throw to RB behind LOS

why_it_works.cover_0: Gets ball out quick, space to run

screen_wr.name: WR Screen (Tunnel/Bubble)

why_it_works.cover_3: Flat defender is LB, too slow

screen_wr.key_read: Get it out quick, let athletes work

cover_0.priority: Quick throws or take shot deep - no safety help
cover_0.key_advice: Must get ball out fast or you're sacked. Hot routes are essential.

cover_1.priority: Crossing routes beat man, posts hold safety
cover_1.key_advice: Use picks/rubs to free receivers. Attack where safety can't help.

cover_1_robber.priority: Go over the robber with verticals
cover_1_robber.key_advice: Robber takes away middle - go deep.

cover_2.priority: Attack middle deep (hole shot) or corner routes
cover_2.key_advice: The hole between safeties is the key. Corner routes beat corners.

cover_2_man.key_advice: Rub routes and crosses beat man. RB wheel beats LB.

tampa_2.priority: Seams and corners - MLB can't cover everything
tampa_2.key_advice: Hit seams before MLB gets depth. Corner routes still work.

cover_3.priority: Seams and curl-flat - 4 vs 3 deep wins
cover_3.key_advice: High-low the flat defender. Attack seams between corner and safety.

cover_3_sky.key_advice: SS in flat means weak side deep is open. Attack backside.

cover_3_cloud.key_advice: Corner in flat is slow to react - quick game wins.

cover_3_match.key_advice: Routes that sit in zones cause communication issues.

cover_4.priority: Underneath routes - flats and curls wide open
cover_4.key_advice: They're protecting deep - take the easy underneath.

cover_4_palms.key_advice: Safety reads #2 - smash concept creates conflict.

cover_6.key_advice: Identify which side is Cover 2 and attack it with corners.

cover_2_trap.key_advice: If safety jumps one side, the other is wide open.

zone_blitz.key_advice: Get ball out fast. Find the vacated area. Sight adjust.

man_blitz.key_advice: Beat man with picks. Beat blitz with quick throws and screens.

a_gap_blitz.key_advice: Interior blitz opens up middle. Trap the blitzer or throw quick.

edge_blitz.key_advice: Blitzer's zone is empty - attack it immediately.

overload_blitz.priority: Screen away from overload, or throw hot
overload_blitz.key_advice: High risk/reward for defense. Make them pay with big play.
